data.query: SELECT  coalesce(json_agg("root" ), '[]' ) AS "root" FROM  (SELECT  row_to_json((SELECT  "_e"  FROM  (SELECT  "_root.base"."id" AS "id", "_root.base"."username" AS "username"       ) AS "_e"      ) ) AS "root" FROM  (SELECT  *  FROM "public"."test_table"  WHERE (("public"."test_table"."username") = (($2)::varchar))     ) AS "_root.base"      ) AS "_root"

friends.query: SELECT  coalesce(json_agg("root" ), '[]' ) AS "root" FROM  (SELECT  row_to_json((SELECT  "_e"  FROM  (SELECT  "_root.base"."friend_id" AS "friend_id", "_root.base"."friend_username" AS "friend_username"       ) AS "_e"      ) ) AS "root" FROM  (SELECT  *  FROM "public"."test_table_friend"  WHERE (("public"."test_table_friend"."username") = (($2)::varchar))     ) AS "_root.base"      ) AS "_root"
